mapper.select: select user.id as id, user.head_image as headImage, user.ip as ip, user.last_login_time as lastLoginTime, user.name as name, user.phone_number as phoneNumber, user.sex as sex, user.wx_number as wxNumber, user.description as description from front_user user where id = #{id}

select im.id as id, im.name as name, im.title as title, im.size as size, im.description as description, im.like_number as likeNumber, im.redirect_number as redirectNumber, im.browse_number as browseNumber, im.upload_user_id as userId, im.prototype_visit_address as prototypeVisitAddress, im.recognition_visit_address as recognitionVisitAddress from user_like ul left join image im on im.id = ul.image_id where ul.user_id = #{userId}
